item.description:
The health benefits of Brazilian jiu-jitsu are numerous and include increased strength, flexibility, balance, coordination, cardio fitness, mental focus, self-confidence, and a sense of accomplishment. Brazilian jiu-jitsu is the art of fighting with your hands, feet, knees, elbows, head, or any other part of your body that you can reach. item.title: 17 Health Benefits of Pineapples for Women: How Does it Help Them?
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Pineapple has long been known as a healthy food choice for women. It contains high levels of vitamin C, potassium, manganese, copper, and fiber. But did you know that pineapple also contains bromelain, an enzyme that helps prevent cancerous tumors from forming? item.title: 12 Health Benefits of Fejoada ( Brazil’s Favorite Meal)
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Feijoada is a traditional Brazilian dish made with beans, pork, sausage, and rice. It’s typically served as a main course, but it also makes a great side dish. Feijoada has been around since the 17th century, but it wasn’t until the 1950s that the dish became popular outside Brazil.
